name: Goblin dash (itch)
description:
Goblin dash is an action platformer game where we try to escape from the cave. Made in 48 hours for OYGEM Game Hackathon in Izmir/Turkey. You can share speedrun records with community in discord https://discord.gg/Mb7fV3WZ

X ==> Jump <==  Joystick Button 3

Z  ==> Dash <== Joystick Button 2

wasd,arrows==> Movement <== Joystic axes

R ==>Restart Speedrun <==  Joystick Button 0

My Speedrun Record
